entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview 2 #301
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-26190 | Microsoft QUIC Denial of Service Vulnerability #300
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21392: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #299
  • .NET March 2024 Updates #298

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [tvos][arm64][mono] Attempting USB tunnel between the port 56494 on the device and the port 56494 (44764) on the mac: 61 #99649
  • [API Proposal]: System.Globalization.CompareOptions.UseNLS #99646
  • [API Proposal]: SHAKE squeezing #99645
  • Undefined behavior when the number of function parameters and the number of arguments does not match #99644
  • Announcement: PR Merge on Green will be enforced from 3/19/2024 #99643
    9.0.0
  • WASM: dotnet-resources cache added to every path of a SPA #99642
  • Time out in Directed_3.0.1 work item #99638
  • Don't throw exception in ServiceDescriptor #99622
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21392: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #99621
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-26190 | Microsoft QUIC Denial of Service Vulnerability #99620
  • Test Crash: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH #99623
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding for UTF8 #99614
  • IXmlSerializable on a struct with a parameterless constructor throws an InvalidProgramException on Derserialize #99613
  • ILC crashes on x64, works on arm64 #99611
    9.0.0
  • `netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1.0-x64.rpm` cannot be installed on FIPS-enabled system #99610
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed with "Device or resource busy" #99609
  • Not all built assemblies have deterministic source paths #99594
  • ILLink rooting assemblies with forwarded types #99592
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/7/2024 9:14:14 PM #99616
  • Access violation (crashes the process) while writing EventSource events #99603
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] Freesql error: Ambiguous match found for 'System.TimeSpan System.TimeSpan FromSeconds(Int64)'. #99588
  • Event log shows 5011 for sharepoint IIS log after the CU #99581
  • AOT optimization #99580
  • HttpClient async calls not throwing TaskCanceledException on Android when token canceled #99568

Closed

  • ObservableGauge Tags Aren't Being Properly Passed to MeterListener #99629
  • New usage analyzer: warn on bad lambda capture #93331
  • Analyzer: Adjust code for numeric `IntPtr`. #72348
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint test failing with multithreaded build - `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #81646
    9.0.0
  • Blazor C# Debugger doesn't hit C# breakpoint after calling async Javascript function #78475
    9.0.0
  • Q: Is building the CoreCLR runtime on Unix supported with FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE disabled? #99484
  • Create a user-friendly design for feature switches #82783
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute model for feature APIs #96859
    9.0.0
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object exception in NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() #93969
  • AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() crashes with NullReferenceException #99452
  • Add RIDs for Alpine 3.19 #96155
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Make `ElapsedEventArgs` constructor public #99635
  • Null dereference in forward subtitution #99540
  • Assertion failed 'addrClone != nullptr' #99551
    9.0.0
  • ILC fails with System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #99409
  • PersianCalendarTests.IsLeapYear failing #98795
    9.0.0
  • ECDsa instance is not usable when private key is imported a second time #99605
    Future
  • Arm64: Implement SVE encodings #94549
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: offset is out of bounds #98630
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] HttpClientCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98201
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] InvokerCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98145
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience .NET Standard compatible #99598
  • When will Ubuntu 22.04 (aarch64) be supported? Can I use the Ubuntu 20.04 apt repository on Ubuntu 22.04? Is that kosher? #99572
  • Whats the difference between xamarin.gpg and mono-official-archive-keyring.gpg when using a linux apt repository? #99571
  • Proposal: Hide Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite #27997
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #99651
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99650
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Port arm64 INLINE_GETTHREAD from NativeAOT #99648
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Guard ToolboxItem by a new feature switch #99647
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Use attributes for IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch #99641
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99640
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • Avoid OrderBy.ToArray/ToList overheads for length 1 #99639
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • [mono] CodeQL fix set #1 #99637
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough checks in fgNewBBbefore/after #99636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough restriction in fgOptimizeEmptyBlock #99634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • Add 0/null checks for various cases in the COM/dynamic VARIANT extensions #99631
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove assert when setting DOTNET_MaxVectorTBitwidth to 512 #99630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable edge checks throughout #99628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack walking for new eh 4 #99624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SpinLock class smaller #99618
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][mt] Add MT option to container configs #99615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][ws] Fix WebSocket state propagation delay in `ReceiveAsync` #99612
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99607
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Don't set ENABLE_WERROR in VMR CI build in mono.proj #99604
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct info value in crossgen2 #99602
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support DisableTlsResume switch on Windows as well #99593
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not allow DynamicCodeSupport=true for NativeAOT #99590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix alignment for vector types #99589
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable NORETURN annotation on PROCAbort for Arm #99587
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99583
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99582
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.30
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #99626
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99606
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #99627
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Add fgRedirectTrueEdge, fgRedirectFalseEdge #99561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a parent check to the forward substitution tree walk #99546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `m_srcUseLclFld` and `m_dstUseLclFld` #99556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99461
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [docs] Update mono android debugging docs #99633
    needs-area-label
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #99625
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Use templated implementations of isValidImm methods #99574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Re-enable calendars tests on NativeAOT/ARM32 #99595
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use existing Range vectorized fill in Enumerable.OrderBy #99538
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] WS cancelation fix #99522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] drop managed keepalive from thread pool #99524
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Don't inline methods with the DoesNotReturn attribute in interp #99550
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable jiterp safepoints in single-threaded WASM #99558
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #99577
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.4
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #99578
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.18
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #99579
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.4
  • Move CodeQL config file to root #99575
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Evidence types to AcccessControl NETFramework Facade #99462
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.29
  • Enable most SDL-required C/C++ warnings #99470
    area-Infrastructure
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99569
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.4
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.18
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the March release #99570
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.29
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for Alpine 3.19 / 3.20 #99560
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix negative lookaround stack handling #99424
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add enums to Enumerable.Order implicitly stable check #99533
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: more likelihood checking #99541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve precision of the vectorized trig functions #99549
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Update boot.json manifest generation order #99525
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99357
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Allow using VS to run host tests when libraries use different config #91873
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Show the VMR commit hash in dotnet --info #99482
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • CI test #99281
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PrivateAssets=all has different behavior than PrivateAssets=compile;build;buildTransitive.... #39465

Closed

  • You must install .NET to run this application / .NET location: Not found #39259
  • Where is .NET SDK 5.0.416? The latest download is 5.0.408. #39409

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #39453
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #39449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #39450
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #39451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #39452
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #39454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hide workload update message Fixes #37520 #39185
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #39455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Watch UI #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964
  • Champion "Allow no-arg constructor and field initializers in struct declarations" #99
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ref-struct-interfaces.md #8000

Updated

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: SourceTextTokenParser #72518
    17.10
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common from 4.8.0 to 4.9.2 Causes Roslyn Analyzer to be Ignored and No Code Gen #72517
  • [VB]False-positive "Cast is redundant" for `DirectCast` #72505
    Backlog
  • Port existing low-level diagnostic service tests over to just testing through LSP #72504
  • The compiler doesn't flag errors in simple 'using' statements. #72496
    17.10

Closed

  • InterceptsLocation with generic return value does not work #72268
  • Missing member suggestions object initializer after target-typed constructor in collection expression for array #72400
    Backlog
  • Hashtags not being treated correctly in a raw string literal #72513
  • Custom `IEnumarable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` + Collection Initalizer causes `csc.exe` to crash #72461
  • Crash in params with interpolated string handler arguments #71488
    .NET 9
  • List SetCount/AsSpan optimization should produce a list with same capacity as List made with new/Add #72318
  • Missing nullability warnings in delegate conversions #72253
  • Remove `==`/`!=`/`=`/`<>` whose operands are bool value (true / false) and literal, or replace them with `!`/`Not` if necessary #72506
  • `nameof` for type-keywords causes CS1525 #72501

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix doc comment #72514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use the project cone information in Scope.FindAssetsAsync (part 2) #72512
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose semantic tokens functionality to Razor EA #72495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status for Params Collections #72516
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Add a unit test to ensure object initialisers supports completion in collection expressions #72515
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'features/ParamsCollections' into 'main' #72511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Move to scout queue #72493
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use the project cone information in Scope.FindAssetsAsync #72509
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pack resource IDs and adjust Compiler Test Plan #72499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust GetUnderlyingCollectionExpressionElement to handle params collections #72498
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix logic in compilation tracker causing an assert #72492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove workspace option #72490
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into ParamsCollections #72497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation and Add method with params array #72469
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • Exclude VS-related packages on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Catch connection lost exceptions from shutting down while refresh req… #72491
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update version of IdentityModel to >= 7.4.0 for 9.x #54518
  • AddOidcAuthentication Logout Not Sending State Query Parameter When Deployed #54515
  • State is not preserved after login in .net 8.02 #54514

  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #54511
  • Nesting Counter Control inside html paragraph tags causes malformed component exception #54510
  • CORS: Headers are not set after client has been redirected from http to https #54509
  • Enhance null safety and compiler warnings for EventCallback<T> #54502
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 report App_Offline.htm #54501
  • Keyed services fail to dependency inject into middleware #54500
  • Quarantine NavMenuHighlightsCurrentLocation #54497
    9.0-preview5
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] The ServicePointManager does not support proxies with the https scheme will pop up when using PeachPied.WordPress.AspNetCore package. #54495
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54494
  • Add a ResponseCompression action filter #54493
    Backlog

Closed

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot Set CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration With Global Interactive Rendering / InteractiveServerRenderMode #54296
  • JWT Token Validation Fails after Upgrade from .NET 6 to .NET 8 #54321
  • Avoid the evaluation of policies if authentication not succeeded #54329
  • [OpenIdConnect] ability to specify a different certificate at runtime, based on scope service #54356
  • Dynamically updating AuthentionSchemes on AuthorizationPolicies #54412
  • When using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate my dotnetcore api will not start when hosted in Azure App Services #54386
  • Bug or Error: Bearer error="invalid_token" #54513
  • .NET 8 Blazor (Server with new template) - Issue with WS-Federation ChallengeAsync throwing a runtime exception #54305
  • Blazor SSR: Partially invalid UI Refresh after submitting EditForm #54432
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, single_query #54471
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #54474
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, json #54472
  • UseExceptionHandler does not work with PublishAot #53764
  • Feature request: ViewComponent bind attributes to public properties #54396
  • How I can implement distributed session using redis in a blazor web app? #54477
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #54480

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove KeyManagementOptions copy constructor #54516
    area-dataprotection
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Quarantine NavMenuHighlightsCurrentLocation #54498
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #54507
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.4
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #54506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.18
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #54505
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.29
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24161.2 #54483
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview3
  • Use the VMR commit hash in .version #54461
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, 8.0.4
  • backport 8.0 - http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54437
    Servicing-approved, feature-httpsys, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.29

Updated

  • Improve usage of `Type.GetType` when activating types in data protection #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Un-retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #54450
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286

  • Match arguments and property names in UserLoginInfo #54298
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • system.Diagnostics.Metrics does add my counter in the instrument in case of dotnet MAUI applicaiton when running android emulator using OpenTelemetry #21165
  • [BUG] Setting MapType to MapType.Hybrid for Windows does not display street labels with the map #21163

    .NET 8 SR4
  • Null Pointer Crash in KeyboardAutoScrollManager.AdjustPosition #21160
  • MAUI Windows application not navigating when app not in focus. #21158
    Backlog
  • Selecting a link/button in a WebView MAUI app for IOS fails and unexpectedly shuts down app. #21157
  • Text of Shell MenuItem not visible in ReleaseMode on Android #21155
  • Finished creating package, but nothing package found #21153
  • [Android][Handler/Layout Engine] Custom Entry with TextInputLayout won't respect layout width #21150
  • [Android] android:requiredFeature="false" permissions not working #21149
    Backlog
  • Memory raising when using flyout navigation #21147
  • Page weak reference is still alive after pushing and popping pages modally or normally #21143

Closed

  • Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #15802
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView on main is broken on WIndows #21001
    .NET 8 SR4
  • 'IsEnable' property is not working with trigger in Button control #21148

    Backlog
  • WinUI crash at shell navigation #20514
    Backlog
  • Android NavigationPage in inconsistent state if Push/Pop operations are performed sometime after app deactivation #16441
    Backlog
  • [Android] When device locked/using another app, if Navigation occurs it will fail and leave the app in a broken state #21113
  • CSC : warning CS8785: Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source #20232

Merged

    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix UI loop when setting ContentInset #21140

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076

  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Consider parallelizing the crossgen phase of the installer build #9227
  • .Net Core on Ubuntu 18.04 stuck on setup (also on 16.04) #6269
  • Setup authoring generate random guid for ComponentID it breaks ref count #6160
  • Consider closing/restarting console windows after setup #6793

  • Multi-version .NET Core Installer #9226
  • ASP.net core Getting Http error code 404 instead of 401 when authentication fails #5845
  • NETFramework.ReferenceAssemblies on Windows not used when missing Framework TP #5824
  • Latest Release Version of 2.2 is lower than the previous #5820
  • No installers or binaries available for latest v3.1.100 rtm release at usual distribution locations #5806
  • Have dotnet-sdk-3.0 Linux packages depend on exact dotnet-targeting-pack version #5738
  • A fatal error occurred, the folder [/usr/local/bin/host/fxr] does not exist #5721
  • Proposal for changes for Cloud Native Buildpacks #5440
  • Stale version badges in README.md #5412
  • Stable builds should be correctly identified #4865
  • Installers and checksums should publish to suffixed locations #4864
  • When the global registered install location keys are 'null'; users can't install via. SDK stand-alone installer #4565
